Package io.craigmiller160.stockmarket.gui

Contains all the classes that compose the User Interface of this program.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BuySellPanel
    A GUI panel with the controls for buying and selling stocks on it.
    Frame
    A GUI frame that is the container for this program.
    MenuBar
    A GUI menubar for this program.
    PortfolioPanel
    The panel containing the stock portfolio.
    SearchPanel
    GUI class that defines the panel containing the search bar for looking up stocks.
    StockDetailsPanel
    GUI component that defines the panel that displays the detailed information about a stock.
    StockDisplayPanel
    GUI component that defines the display panel where stock information appears.
    StockHistoryPanel
    Utilizes the JFreeChart library to display a chart of the history of a stock's price.
    ToolBar
    GUI class that defines a toolbar for the application window.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PortfolioState
    Constant values for the state of the portfolio during the lifecycle of this program.

Package io.craigmiller160.stockmarket.gui Description

Contains all the classes that compose the User Interface of this program. These classes are also collectively known as the "view" of the program.

All GUI classes extend AbstractListenerView to be fully compatible with the MVP Framework. All dialogs conform to this design, passing all events to listening controllers.

Since:
Version 2.0
Author:
Craig
